entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers this evening then 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 this evening. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Flurries beginning near noon. Amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 9 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Low minus 4.
